parameters.name: AbacPolicyContent
parameters.description: The content of the policy. Specifies whether the authorized user can access and use the resources and features defined in the policy.

parameters.name: AbacPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy. The name must be unique for the tenant.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the DMS console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
